title: Blaze - The Rock Dinosaur (EP) (2014)ak
description:
Blaze was formed in 1998 at Osaka, Japan by Hisashi Suzuki - Guitars (ex-Strange Flavor), Wataru Shiota - Vocals (ex-High Wire), Kenichi Kuwahara - Bass (ex-Strange Flavor) and Tsuneo Shibatani - Drums (ex-High Wire). They released a 2-track CDR demo-single "See The Light / Night Walker" in 2001. Tsuneo Shibatani quit the band in 2002 and Blaze couldn't find a drummer in over 1 year, but in 2003, Yasuhito Yamamoto (ex-Tier Dizzy) joined. In Junie 1st, 2007 Blaze released this 10-track album on the small label WILD ONE.



Band Members

Kenichi Kuwahara	Bass
Hisashi Suzuki	Guitars
Wataru Shiota	Vocals
Takashi "Bikky" Funabiki	Drums



The Rock Dinosaur (EP) (2014)



01 one way flight
02 shed light on dark
03 right in white light
04 underground heroes
05 the going gets rough
06 lady of starlight
